text: Meiyou canji er anzuo jiazhong de xinshi, yu ping ziji de caichan he shengming wei zhu dao er fendou de xinshi, bici shi bu xiangtong de. Ping ziji de caichan he shengming er kangzhan de ren, an la shi tamen chaoguo anzuo zai jiazhong de ren yi ji. An la yingxu zhe liang deng ren yao shou zui youhou de baochou. Chu anzuo zhe suo shou de baochou wai, an la jia ci kangzhan de ren yi zhong zhongda de baochou——
